description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jigsaw Jumble is a game for one or two players.   With over 20 different jigsaws to play each with 3 difficulty levels and the ability to load and resume games, there is plenty of gameplay for all the family.
